events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I want to request a refund because the size I received is incorrect and it doesn't fit at all.
The reported issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back due to incorrect sizing.
The case has been assigned to the refunds department to handle the customer's request for returning the jacket.

Sure, my order number is 987654321. The jacket has not been worn yet and all the tags are still intact as I just received it yesterday.
Thank you for the information. We will send you a prepaid return shipping label via email shortly. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response. I appreciate your assistance with making this refund process easy.
The return shipping label has been sent to your email. If you have any further questions, feel free to contact us again. We consider this case resolved.
Just checking in to make sure you were able to send back the jacket and to confirm if the refund was received as expected.
Yes, I mailed the jacket yesterday and I received the refund today. Everything went smoothly, thanks again!
We are glad to hear your refund was successful. Closing the case now, and thank you for choosing our store.
